attributes.action: ensure that the local authority maintain Askern Lake in Doncaster to a suitable high standard and prevent rubbish contaminating the environment and harming local wildlife.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Askern Lake is a small lake in the Doncaster area that is inhabited by a wide range of birdlife.  However the local authority fails to maintain it to any standard at all with rubbish polluting the lake and surrounding environment.
